name: Dreamweaver
description: Dreamweaver is a paid text editor part of the Adobe Creative Cloud, it was originally created by Macromedia in 1997, until they were aquired by Adobe in 2005. Adobe Dreamweaver is only available for macOS and Windows, and is not supported for linux. Dreamweaver has a unique interface allowing users to visually live view and code at the same time, it also comes equipped with all the features you could need like code completion, syntax highlighting, etc. It's initial release was December 1997, but its most stable and recent release was 13 June 2017.
